insights.finding: Potential URL Exposure in Startup Log
insights.recommendation: Use secure logging practices. Sanitize or mask sensitive configuration details before logging. Consider using parameterized logging to prevent potential information disclosure.
Implement strict environment configuration management. Avoid logging full URLs or sensitive configuration details. Use secure configuration management practices.

insights.finding: Null Check Missing on URL Property
insights.recommendation: Add null checks before accessing environment properties to prevent potential NullPointerExceptions. Implement safe property retrieval with default values.
